thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 103 of 7354
thread.title: James L
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by James L

author: James L
title: James L
text: I've bought a LOT of equipment from B&H over the years. From buying in the store in NYC to having gear shipped all over the country when I've needed something in a pinch. They've never failed to help when I've need advice, and the online buying has been almost too-easy. They stand behind what they sell- and will come alongside their customers when they need help. That's what a successful business does for all its customers.
